title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Education Design for Central Venous Catheter Insertion Procedure: GE

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical skills and knowledge of anatomy
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform a central venous catheter insertion simulation procedure with at least 80% accuracy by applying GEL and ELT instructional methods.
Learners can write an analytical report comparing performance outcomes (checklist scores, pass rates, error rates) between the two instructional methods.
Learners can explain at least three advantages of GEL (structured feedback, step-by-step guidance) in simulation-based learning.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
